cd:ProductType.name: MER_LRC_2P

cd:ProductType.name: MER_RRC_2P

cd:ProductDefinition.cd:Description: This definition is based on version 5/B of product specification PO-RS-MDA-GS-2009 Vol11

cd:ProductType.name: MER_RRV_2P
cd:ProductType.cd:Description: MERIS Extracted Vegetation Indices (Vegetation indices including atmospheric corrections for selected land regions) for NRT distribution (stripline)

cd:ProductDefinition.cd:Description: This definition is based on version 5/B of product specification PO-RS-MDA-GS-2009 Vol11
